rules: Tap +1, +2, or +3 to add to the count
Pass the phone around the group
Hit 31? You drink!
Take turns tapping the screen ‚Äî no talking!
Two people tap at the same time?
Both players drink!
nunchitap.fail_message: Double tap detected. You both drink!

rules: Read the prompt aloud to everyone
All players point at the person who fits best
Spin the wheel to decide their punishment!

rules: Read the 'Never Have I Ever‚Ä¶' prompt aloud
Done it before? Take a drink!
Keep going until someone cries
prompts: Never have I ever ghosted someone.
Never have I ever lied about my age.
Never have I ever sent a risky text to the wrong person.
Never have I ever fake cried to get out of trouble.
Never have I ever checked my ex's social media.
Never have I ever stolen something from a hotel.
Never have I ever skipped work/class to sleep.
Never have I ever forgotten an anniversary or birthday.
Never have I ever re-gifted a present.
Never have I ever fallen asleep in public.
Never have I ever snooped through someone's phone.
Never have I ever practiced an argument in the mirror.
Never have I ever used someone else's toothbrush.
Never have I ever laughed at a joke I didn't get.
Never have I ever tripped in public and played it off.
Never have I ever accidentally 'liked' an old post while stalking.
Never have I ever blamed a fart on a pet.
Never have I ever faked being sick to cancel plans.
Never have I ever slid into someone's DMs and gotten ignored.
Never have I ever worn the same underwear two days in a row.
Never have I ever typed 'lol' with a completely straight face.
Never have I ever eavesdropped on strangers and gotten invested.
Never have I ever made a fake social media account.

Never have I ever kissed more than one person in a night.
Never have I ever had a one-night stand.
Never have I ever done the walk of shame.
Never have I ever hooked up with a friend's ex.
Never have I ever joined the mile high club.
Never have I ever faked an orgasm.
Never have I ever used a dating app just for hookups.
I have never pretended to be on the phone to avoid someone.
I have never had a crush on a fictional character that was embarrassingly intense.
I have never made up an excuse to leave a bad date early.
I have never gone through something painful just to impress someone.
I have never regretted a relationship that everyone told me was a bad idea.

rules: Draw a card and follow its rule
Every King drawn fills the center cup
The 4th King must drink it all!
kingscup.game_over_msg: You drew the final King. Finish the center cup!

A.title: Waterfall
A.desc: Everyone starts drinking. You can't stop until the person to your right stops.

4.title: Floor
4.desc: Everyone touches the floor. Last one drinks.

7.title: Heaven
7.desc: Reach for the sky. Last one drinks.

8.title: Mate
8.desc: Pick a mate. Every time you drink, they drink.

9.title: Rhyme
9.desc: Say a word. Go in a circle rhyming. First to mess up drinks.

10.title: Categories
10.desc: Pick a category (e.g., cars). Go in a circle. First to mess up drinks.

J.title: Rule Master
J.desc: Make a rule that lasts the whole game. Anyone who breaks it drinks.

Q.title: Question Master
Q.desc: Ask someone a question. If they answer without a question, they drink.

K.title: King's Cup
K.desc: Pour some of your drink into the center cup.

rules: Read the question out loud to everyone
Debate which side is more guilty
Tap REVEAL ‚Äî that side drinks!

prompts.q: Who ghosts after a great first date?
Who says '5 minutes' but takes 2 hours to get ready?
Who says 'I'm fine' when they're clearly NOT fine?
Who double-texts after being left on read?
Who checks their ex's Instagram at midnight?
Who falls in love after ONE good conversation?

Who brings up their ex in every other sentence?
Who leaves dirty dishes in the sink for days?
Who fake-laughs at bad jokes to be nice?
Who says 'we need to talk' for literally no reason?
Who forgets every single anniversary?
Who cries during movies but denies it?
Who overshares relationship drama with their friends?
Who refuses to ask for directions?
Who says 'just a friend' about someone who is NOT just a friend?
Who weaponizes the silent treatment?
Who texts back 'lol' and calls it a conversation?
Who falls for the unavailable one every single time?
Who makes every argument about something from 3 years ago?
Who has 17 unread messages but posts on Instagram?
Who catches feelings and immediately panics?
Who says 'I don't care' but ABSOLUTELY cares?
Who takes the longest to apologize first?

after_dark_prompts.q: Who thinks they're better in bed than they actually are?

More likely to have a 'type' but never actually date that type?
More likely to overanalyze a simple text?
More likely to say 'I love you' way too early?
More likely to stay in a toxic relationship because the chemistry is fire?

rules: Pass phone to the person in the hot seat
Questions appear one by one
Answer honestly OR take a drink and pass
prompts: What's your biggest insecurity?
Who in this room would you call at 3am in an emergency?
What's a lie you told today?
Who in this room do you trust the least?
What's one thing you've never told anyone here?
If you could erase one memory, what would it be?
